title: About Yesterday (Ep 1430)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the dramatic events that unfolded on Capitol Hill yesterday. 
News Picks:


The media hypocrisy regarding political violence is astonishing to watch.

Joint session of Congress certifies electoral college count. 

Twitter ruthlessly locks President Trump’s account after he calls for peace.

Is the digital media revolution coming?
